original_text: And righteousness shall be the girdle of his loins, and faithfulness the girdle of his reins.
korean_text: 공의로 그의 허리띠를 삼으며 성실로 그의 몸의 띠를 삼으리라

sentences.original_text: And righteousness shall be the girdle of his loins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 의는 그의 허리띠가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and faithfulness the girdle of his reins
